movie.title: Envelop(e)
movie.description_intro: After her parents pass Amy is left the house and finds a family secret that her parents never told her about.
movie.description_full: After her parents pass Amy is left the house and finds a family secret that her parents never told her about.

movies.title: Drop Dead Fred
movies.summary: A young woman who's attempting to find her place in the world battles with her controlling mother and a womanizing husband finds comfort and confusion with the appearance of her childhood friend. It is a zappy movie that emphasizes self-actualization.
movies.description_full: A young woman who's attempting to find her place in the world battles with her controlling mother and a womanizing husband finds comfort and confusion with the appearance of her childhood friend. It is a zappy movie that emphasizes self-actualization.

movies.title: A Little Chaos
movies.summary: Famed builder Le Notre is tasked with building an ethereal palace for King Louis XIV (Rickman) that transcends beauty. Le Notre hires Sabine de Barra (Winslet) to design and construct the outdoor ballroom, and is soon captivated by her beauty. Sabine is equally enthralled by Le Notre though she is struggling to deal with her past. Through the trials of building the garden the two starving artists come together.

movies.title: The Eagle and the Albatross
movies.summary: When an orphaned half Korean girl finds herself in small town America with her only living relative, she seeks out a mentor to help with the only things she loves - golf. The best player in town, the widowed optometrist, takes her under his wing, sending them on a journey to face their fear of losing loved ones and their game. The only problem is, he has three months to live.

movies.title: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India
movies.title_english: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India
movies.title_long: The Last Cartridge, an Incident of the Sepoy Rebellion in India (1908)
movies.summary: Caught off-guard by Indian mutineers, a British soldier saves his last bullet for his daughter lest she be taken. This silent film features an original, scene-specific piano score compiled from period appropriate photoplay music.
movies.description_full: Caught off-guard by Indian mutineers, a British soldier saves his last bullet for his daughter lest she be taken. This silent film features an original, scene-specific piano score compiled from period appropriate photoplay music.
